Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Q:

How do I set an EAX reverb room style?

A:

Use the AIL_set_3D_room_type to set the EAX room first, and then call AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level to turn the effects volume up for the 3D samples that should have reverb.

Previous Topic (My 3D audio is a lot louder than my 2D audio - what can I do?)
